hero.headline: Leap GPS ‚Äì The Global Pathway System
hero.subheadline: Unifying IELTS Prep, University Applications, and Financial Eligibility into a single source of truth for the modern international student.

pmSection.title: üéØ Integrated Success: Senior PM Case Study for Leap
pmSection.body: Identified the ‚ÄúStudy Abroad Black Box‚Äù‚Äîa fragmented student journey across test prep, university selection, and financing. Conceptualized Leap GPS (Global Pathway System) to unify LeapScholar and LeapFinance into a single, data-driven pathway. Built as an extra-mile case study to demonstrate structured problem-solving, product judgment under ambiguity, and AI-first thinking. While conceptual, it showcases my ability to turn high-anxiety, siloed journeys into transparent decision frameworks.

about.title: What is Leap?
about.aboutBody: Leap is the world‚Äôs largest end-to-end platform for international education. It offers a comprehensive suite of products including IELTS test prep, university counseling, visa assistance, and specialized financial products via LeapFinance. By combining edtech and fintech, Leap aims to democratize access to global education for thousands of students annually.
about.goal: The goal? Eliminate the fragmentation in the study-abroad journey by creating a unified 'Command Center' that aligns a student's academic profile with their financial reality.
industryBullets: Students often apply to 'dream' universities only to realize later they cannot secure funding.
Lack of transparency in the application funnel leads to high anxiety and counselor dependency.
Post-admission logistics (housing, roommates) remains an offline, unorganized struggle.
about.mission: Mission: Build a transparent, integrated ecosystem where every student knows their 'Fin-Fit' status and application progress in real-time.

userSegments: Aspirants in the early discovery phase (IELTS/GRE prep)
Shortlisters seeking a balance between university prestige and loan eligibility
Applicants stuck in the 'waiting period' post-submission
Final-stage students planning their departure (Visa & Housing)
userGoals: Identify universities where they are both academically and financially 'Pre-Approved'
Track application status with 100% transparency to avoid 'counselor ghosting'
Build a network of peers heading to the same city/university
Gamify the tedious document-gathering process to stay motivated
businessFocus: Increase 'Attach Rate' between LeapScholar (Counseling) and LeapFinance (Loans)
Reduce Lead-to-Application cycle time via automated tracking
Improve User Retention (LTV) by capturing the post-admission community phase
Drive higher NPS by replacing opaque offline updates with digital transparency
Maximize Loan Disbursement Value (LDV) by directing users to pre-approved institutions

clientPreferences.description: The vast majority of modern students prioritize platforms that offer integrated financial and academic certainty over traditional, siloed counseling.

topPainPoints.title: The Financial-Academic Disconnect
topPainPoints.problem: Students spend months on applications only to face loan rejections or find the cost of living exceeds their budget. LeapFinance and LeapScholar operate as separate entities in the user's mind, leading to misaligned expectations.
topPainPoints.friction: I got into my dream uni, but I can't get a loan for it. I wish I knew my loan eligibility before I spent $500 on application fees.

topPainPoints.title: The 'Black Box' of Application Status
topPainPoints.problem: Once documents are submitted, students feel 'ghosted.' They rely on WhatsApp pings to counselors for updates, creating a lack of trust and high operational load for the support team.
topPainPoints.friction: It's been 3 weeks since I sent my SOP. My counselor says 'it's in process,' but I don't know if the university has even received it.

topPainPoints.title: Post-Admission Isolation
topPainPoints.problem: After receiving an admit, the journey becomes lonely. Students scramble on Facebook/Telegram groups to find roommates or discuss visa slots, often falling for scams or misinformation.
topPainPoints.friction: I'm heading to Boston in August, but I don't know anyone else going there. Finding a trustworthy roommate feels like a second full-time job.

topPainPoints.title: Document & Milestone Fatigue
topPainPoints.problem: The process requires 20+ documents (Transcripts, SOPs, LORs, Bank Statements). Without a sense of progress, users feel overwhelmed and drop out of the funnel.
topPainPoints.friction: There are so many forms to fill. I don't know how much of the journey I've actually covered or what's left.

proposedSolutions.title: Fin-Fit Shortlisting Engine
proposedSolutions.whatItDoes: A proprietary matching engine that filters universities based on the student's GPA/IELTS score AND their instant LeapFinance credit-check. Only 'Fin-Fit' schools are highlighted as 'High Probability' targets.
proposedSolutions.whyItHelps: Aligns expectations early. Reduces the risk of a student getting an admit they can't fund, thereby increasing LeapFinance conversion rates.
proposedSolutions.example: Based on your 7.5 IELTS and 3.4 GPA, you are pre-approved for a $40k loan at these 12 universities.

proposedSolutions.title: GlassBox Application Tracker
proposedSolutions.whatItDoes: A visual timeline replacing 'In Progress' with specific sub-statuses: 'SOP Proofread,' 'LOR Verified,' 'Application Packet Mailed,' 'Uni Portal Acknowledged.' Direct API integrations with partner uni portals where possible.
proposedSolutions.whyItHelps: Builds radical trust. Reduces counselor support tickets and keeps the student engaged within the Leap app ecosystem.
proposedSolutions.example: Status Update: Your application reached Arizona State University's admissions office today at 10:30 AM EST.

proposedSolutions.title: Future-Mate Pods
proposedSolutions.whatItDoes: Once a student receives an offer, they are auto-added to a 'Pod' of students for that specific city or intake. Includes verified roommate matching and visa-slot alerts within the pod.
proposedSolutions.whyItHelps: Creates a network effect. Increases app stickiness post-admission and provides a fertile ground for cross-selling Forex cards and travel insurance.
proposedSolutions.example: Meet Rahul and Sneha‚Äîthey are also heading to NYU this Fall. Connect now to discuss housing in Brooklyn.

proposedSolutions.title: Dollar-Dream Meter
proposedSolutions.whatItDoes: A progress bar that visualizes the 'Road to the Flight.' Completing milestones (IELTS score upload, Loan Sanction) fills the meter and unlocks rewards like 'Free Forex Card' or 'Flight Voucher.'
proposedSolutions.whyItHelps: Reduces document drop-off. Psychologically rewards the student for every step taken, making a complex process feel like an achievable game.
proposedSolutions.example: You are 85% ready for take-off! Get your visa stamped to unlock your Free Scapia Card / $50 Flight Voucher.

featurePrioritization.title: ‚öñÔ∏è Fin-Fit Shortlisting Engine
featurePrioritization.description: P0: Strategic Core. High impact on both User Value and Business Revenue (LeapFinance attach rates).

featurePrioritization.title: üì¶ GlassBox Application Tracker
featurePrioritization.description: P0: Trust & Retention. Essential to solve the primary user anxiety and reduce operational costs of counseling.

featurePrioritization.title: üìä Dollar-Dream Meter
featurePrioritization.description: P1: Engagement. Low-to-medium effort that drives document completion and stickiness through rewards.

featurePrioritization.title: ü§ù Future-Mate Pods
featurePrioritization.description: P2: Social/Network Effect. High value for long-term brand, but requires a critical mass of 'Admitted' students to work.

successMetrics.title: üìà Revenue & Cross-Sell
metrics: Attach Rate: % of Scholar users taking a LeapFinance loan
Average Loan Disbursement Value (LDV) per user

successMetrics.title: ‚ö° Efficiency & Trust
metrics: Reduction in 'Status Check' support tickets/WhatsApp pings
Median time taken to upload required documents (Document Velocity)
NPS of the application journey vs industry standard

successMetrics.title: üåê Community & Retention
metrics: Daily Active Users (DAU) in Future-Mate Pods
Number of successful 'Roommate Matches' via the platform
Referral Rate: % of new leads coming from Pod members

nextSteps.title: Integrative Discovery Interviews
nextSteps.description: Interview 20+ students who recently received admits to map the exact 'anxiety gap' between university acceptance and loan sanctioning to refine Fin-Fit logic.

nextSteps.title: MVP: Fin-Fit Matching Engine
nextSteps.description: Develop the backend logic that calculates real-time loan eligibility against the total Cost of Attendance (COA) for 100+ partner universities.

nextSteps.title: GlassBox Status Integration
nextSteps.description: Establish automated API triggers between internal counselor CRM systems and the student dashboard to replace manual status updates with real-time tracking.

nextSteps.title: Beta Launch: Future-Mate Pods
nextSteps.description: Roll out community pods for the 'Fall 2026' cohort heading to London/Boston to test the impact of peer-networking on housing and Forex card adoption.

aboutMeDescription: Technical Product Manager specializing in high-impact AI and Fintech solutions. I bridge the gap between complex engineering and business growth, evidenced by delivering $90K ARR at Unifyapps and securing a ‚Çπ13Cr renewal at MoveInSync. With a zero-to-one execution mindset‚Äîhighlighted by launching ChitX in just 4 days‚ÄîI thrive on transforming fragmented user journeys into seamless, automated ecosystems like Leap GPS.

keySkills.title: ü§ñ AI-First Product Execution
keySkills.description: Expertise in deploying LLMs, Agentic AI, and RAG pipelines to automate complex workflows, reducing manual effort by up to 95% as demonstrated at Unifyapps.

keySkills.title: üìà Scalable Fintech UX
keySkills.description: Deep understanding of financial logic (XIRR, Credit, AP lifecycles) and the ability to simplify high-stakes financial data into intuitive, high-adoption interfaces.

keySkills.title: ‚ö° Rapid 0-to-1 Prototyping
keySkills.description: Obsessed with speed-to-market; proficient in using AI-assisted development (Cursor, Lovable) to build, test, and ship production-ready apps in record time.

keySkills.title: üéØ Data-Driven Prioritization
keySkills.description: Skilled in using RICE and multivariate testing to drive measurable outcomes, such as improving site SLAs by 15% and boosting trip ratings from 3.9 to 4.6.

topBets.title: Real-Time Fin-Fit API
topBets.description: Integration with major credit bureaus to provide 'Loan Confidence Scores' in milliseconds during the search phase.

topBets.title: AI SOP Evaluator
topBets.description: Integrating LLMs to give instant feedback on SOPs, accelerating the 'Application Ready' milestone.

topBets.title: Leap 'Landing' Services
topBets.description: Expanding the 'Pods' into physical airport pickups and local bank account opening assistance.

quickWins: Launch the GlassBox Tracker dashboard for the top 50 partner universities.
Introduce the 'Fin-Fit' tag on search results for universities with pre-approved loan structures.
Implement the Dollar-Dream Meter to gamify document uploads and reduce counseling lag.
Pilot Future-Mate Pods for the Fall 2026 intake for top UK/US cities.
Automate WhatsApp 'Milestone Alerts' triggered by the GlassBox backend.
Roll out 'Free Scapia Card' / 'Flight Voucher' rewards for users who complete their visa documentation within 7 days.
longTermBets: Develop an 'Institutional Dashboard' for universities to directly update application statuses in Leap GPS.
Launch a peer-to-peer lending marketplace within LeapFinance for niche courses.
Build a 'Leap Verified' badge for housing providers to integrate into Future-Mate Pods.
